sentences.en: Her friends are all pretty unsavoury characters.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友尽是些不三不四的人。

sentences.en: Is he still touting about those unsavoury opinions of his?
sentences.cn: 他还在兜售他的那些令人讨厌的意见 吗 ?
这个地区真是个藏污纳垢之地.

sentences.en: Study of these unsavoury personalities has been left to psychologists and historians.
sentences.cn: 对这些讨厌人物的研究则留给了心理学家和历史学家.

sentences.en: The club has an unsavoury reputation.
There were a lot of unsavoury characters(= unpleasant people ) around the station.
sentences.cn: 车站周围有许多不三不四的人。

words.tran_cn: 难吃的；没有香味的；令人讨厌的
